VCH_S1_PASS.name: XRI Associate for Artocos Island Missions
VCH_S1_PASS.description: Unlimited access to rover features like infrared imaging, panoramas, and accelerated photo scheduling for missions on Artocos Island

VCH_ALL_PASS.name: XRI Pioneer
VCH_ALL_PASS.description: Unlimited access to rover features like infrared imaging, panoramas, and accelerated photo scheduling for all missions, including early access to missions at future locations
